thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 2 of 71
thread.title: Ijones

author: Ijones
title: Ijones
text: The website was easy to navigate, prices were competitive, the check out process was simple, the communication was timely and appropriate, and the shipping was prompt and professionally packed. All of this was expected from a trusted online retailer. What was not expected was how much I would enjoy the "generic" Colorado Pen blue-black ink cartridges. Great color and great performance that has enhanced one of my everyday carry pens that I have with me at all times. Thanks, much!
